name: The Legend Of Shifu
description:
Help Shifu the cat to defeat all his enemies !

5 awesome worlds

  • The Darkest Dungeon
  • The Death Valley
  • The Forest Of Ruin
  • The Mountains Of Madness
  • The Eyjafjallajökull Volcano

5 terrifying boss

  • The Evil Crousti
  • The Evil Bane
  • The Evil Stella
  • The Evil Cobalt
  • The Evil Choco

Controls

  • Move : left stick/dpad or arrow keys
  • Shoot : right stick/XYAB buttons or WASD/ZQSD
  • Play : start or enter
  • Quit : select or escape
